setUrl(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the public URL associated with this address.

setLatitude(double).Description: Sets the latitude associated with this address.

setLongitude(double).Description: Sets the longitude associated with this address.

getCountryCode().Description: Returns the country code of the address, for example "US", or null if it is unknown.

getPostalCode().Description: Returns the postal code of the address, for example "94110", or null if it is unknown.

getExtras().Description: Returns additional provider-specific information about the address as a Bundle. The keys and values are determined by the provider. If no additional information is available, null is returned.

getSubThoroughfare().Description: Returns the sub-thoroughfare name of the address, which may be null. This may correspond to the street number of the address.

setCountryCode(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the country code of the address to the given String, which may be null.

getFeatureName().Description: Returns the feature name of the address, for example, "Golden Gate Bridge", or null if it is unknown

setAdminArea(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the administrative area name of the address to the given String, which may be null

setPremises(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the premises of the address to the given String, which may be null.

Throws: if this Address has not been assigned a phone number.
getPhone().Description: Returns the phone number of the address if known, or null if it is unknown.

setLocality(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the locality of the address to the given String, which may be null.

clearLongitude().Description: Removes any longitude associated with this address.

Parameters: Parcel: The Parcel in which the object should be written.
int: Additional flags about how the object should be written. May be 0 or @B_android#os#Parcelable#PARCELABLE_WRITE_RETURN_VALUE_E@.
writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel, int).Description: Flatten this object in to a Parcel.
writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel, int).FullName: public void writeToParcel (Parcel parcel, int flags)

getSubLocality().Description: Returns the sub-locality of the address, or null if it is unknown. For example, this may correspond to the neighborhood of the locality.

setThoroughfare(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the thoroughfare name of the address, which may be null.

Throws: if this Address has not been assigned a longitude.
getLongitude().Description: Returns the longitude of the address if known.

setPhone(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the phone number associated with this address.

Returns: a string representation of the object.
toString().Description: Returns a string representation of the object. In general, the toString method returns a string that "textually represents" this object. The result should be a concise but informative representation that is easy for a person to read. It is recommended that all subclasses override this method. The toString method for class Object returns a string consisting of the name of the class of which the object is an instance, the at-sign character `@', and the unsigned hexadecimal representation of the hash code of the object. In other words, this method returns a string equal to the value of:

getLocality().Description: Returns the locality of the address, for example "Mountain View", or null if it is unknown.

setFeatureName(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the feature name of the address to the given String, which may be null

Parameters: Parcel: The Parcel in which the object should be written.

int: Additional flags about how the object should be written. May be 0 or @B_android#os#Parcelable#PARCELABLE_WRITE_RETURN_VALUE_E@. Value is either 0 or a combination of @B_android#os#Parcelable#PARCELABLE_WRITE_RETURN_VALUE_E@, and android.os.Parcelable.PARCELABLE_ELIDE_DUPLICATES

setSubAdminArea(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the sub-administrative area name of the address to the given String, which may be null

hasLongitude().Description: Returns true if a longitude has been assigned to this Address, false otherwise.

clearLatitude().Description: Removes any latitude associated with this address.

setCountryName(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the country name of the address to the given String, which may be null.

Returns: a bitmask indicating the set of special object types marshaled by this Parcelable object instance. Value is either 0 or @B_android#os#Parcelable#CONTENTS_FILE_DESCRIPTOR_E@
describeContents().Description: Describe the kinds of special objects contained in this Parcelable instance's marshaled representation. For example, if the object will include a file descriptor in the output of @B_android#os#Parcelable#writeToParcel_E@, the return value of this method must include the @B_android#os#Parcelable#CONTENTS_FILE_DESCRIPTOR_E@ bit.

getThoroughfare().Description: Returns the thoroughfare name of the address, for example, "1600 Ampitheater Parkway", which may be null

setPostalCode(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the postal code of the address to the given String, which may be null.

getAdminArea().Description: Returns the administrative area name of the address, for example, "CA", or null if it is unknown

getAddressLine(int).Description: Returns a line of the address numbered by the given index (starting at 0), or null if no such line is present.

setSubThoroughfare(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the sub-thoroughfare name of the address, which may be null.

getMaxAddressLineIndex().Description: Returns the largest index currently in use to specify an address line. If no address lines are specified, -1 is returned.

hasLatitude().Description: Returns true if a latitude has been assigned to this Address, false otherwise.

getLocale().Description: Returns the Locale associated with this address.

getPremises().Description: Returns the premises of the address, or null if it is unknown.

Address(java.util.Locale).Description: Constructs a new Address object set to the given Locale and with all other fields initialized to null or false.

Throws: if this Address has not been assigned a latitude.
getLatitude().Description: Returns the latitude of the address if known.

setSubLocality(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the sub-locality of the address to the given String, which may be null.

setAddressLine(int, java.lang.String).Description: Sets the line of the address numbered by index (starting at 0) to the given String, which may be null.

setAddressLine(int,java.lang.String).Description: Sets the line of the address numbered by index (starting at 0) to the given String, which may be null.
setAddressLine(int,java.lang.String).FullName: public void setAddressLine (int index, String line)

setExtras(android.os.Bundle).Description: Sets the extra information associated with this fix to the given Bundle.

getUrl().Description: Returns the public URL for the address if known, or null if it is unknown.

getSubAdminArea().Description: Returns the sub-administrative area name of the address, for example, "Santa Clara County", or null if it is unknown

getCountryName().Description: Returns the localized country name of the address, for example "Iceland", or null if it is unknown.

ClassDesc: A class representing an Address, i.e, a set of Strings describing a location. The address format is a simplified version of xAL (eXtensible Address Language) http://www.oasis-open.org/committees/ciq/ciq.html#6
